I followed every step on the Cantera powerpoint file, but when I test
the python demos I get the error message:  

The dynamic link library MSVCP71.dll could not be found in the
specified path
C:\Python24\lib\sitepackages\Cantera;.;C:\WINNT\system32;C:\WINNT\system;
and a bunch of other directories.

I am running Windows 2000 and have checke dthe steps several times. 
Does anyone know what the problem is?

Cheers,
Daniel
